response.content:
Hi Avijit, 

Thank you for sharing your feedback. The course does cover isExposed attribute in multiple lectures. For example, please check "Lecture 9 - Hello World Component" which put some light on isExposed attribute.
Similar to this, we are modifying the metafile for all the new components that we create as part of this course. Hope you find it useful.
response.content_html:
Hi Avijit,

Thank you for sharing your feedback. The course does cover isExposed attribute in multiple lectures. For example, please check "Lecture 9 - Hello World Component" which put some light on isExposed attribute.
Similar to this, we are modifying the metafile for all the new components that we create as part of this course. Hope you find it useful.

results.content:
Manish thank you for a good course. 
Great explanation and examples. Your course saved my time to make a quick start of LWC development instead of investigating the documentation from the scratch.
For those who write negative feedbacks - the course includes everything connected with LWC, certainly, to get deeper and obtain complete knowledge you need refer to the official documentation. To clearly understand everything you should have at least basic knowledge of the Aura framework and JS EcmaScript 6.
results.content_html:
Manish thank you for a good course.
Great explanation and examples. Your course saved my time to make a quick start of LWC development instead of investigating the documentation from the scratch.
For those who write negative feedbacks - the course includes everything connected with LWC, certainly, to get deeper and obtain complete knowledge you need refer to the official documentation. To clearly understand everything you should have at least basic knowledge of the Aura framework and JS EcmaScript 6.
